data.title: Vashi Nedomansky, ACE's Blog
data.meta_description: Thank you to Clay Asbury and Premiumbeat.com for choosing VashiVisuals.com as one of their 10. I started this website to share my experiences and ideas with people and to interact with other passionate filmmakers. I greatly appreciate being recognized by Premiumbeat.com and especially for learning about new websites I wasn’t familiar with until now! The […]
